Bring Your 3D Models to Life

A FREE & open-source web application that allows you to animate your 3D models. Animate both humanoid and four-legged creatures.

Human & Animal rigs

  • Supports importing GLB and GLTF formats
  • Human and animal skeleton options
  • Intuitive skeleton positioning

Export Animations

  • T-Pose and A-Pose models supported workflows
  • Animations provided (free human animation library from https://quaternius.com/)
  • Choose multiple animations to export for web or game engines with GLB

Video Walkthrough

How it Works

  1. Import your 3D model
  2. Choose a skeleton (human or animal)
  3. Position the skeleton inside your mesh
  4. Animate your mesh
  5. Export animations to GLB file

About

Mesh2Motion is an open-source project. The goal of this project is to provide a free and easy way to animate 3D models for web and game engines. With the way 3d animations and modeling tools are progressing, there just needs to be some tool like this that is open-source that can evolve.

For more information, visit the GitHub repository.
